original: Aṅkurassa hi pathavī āpo ca paccayo sabhāvo hetu.

original: Yathā vā pana ghaṭe duddhaṁ pakkhittaṁ dadhi bhavati, na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ duddhassa ca dadhissa ca.

original: Evamevaṁ natthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ hetussa ca paccayassa ca.
